title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it produces a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the same bell sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not produce a beeping sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. Clicking on other buttons should not trigger the same bell sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText.
2. Choose SWT.MULTI from the available options.
3. Notice the beeping sound.

To reproduce the additional issue of bell sound when clicking on other buttons:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText.
2. Choose any option in the ControlExampleText.
3. Click on other buttons within the application.
4. Observe that the bell sound is produced on each button click.
